title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.125 - BIRD NESTING AREA Sign (NYW7-20)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.125 - BIRD NESTING AREA Sign (NYW7-20)

State Regulations

Option: 01 The BIRD NESTING AREA (NYW7-20) sign (see Sign Drawing
SD-W26) may be used to warn motorists of bird nesting areas nearby. A Distance
plaque (see Section
2C.55
) may be displayed beneath
the sign. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.125

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
